import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setproduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { // const fetchProduct = async () => { // const res = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) // setproduct(res.data) // } // fetchProduct() }, [match]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
